biography.bio: Well known Norwegian ice hockey-player and coach. Working for TV during the 90's. Son of radio legend Rolf Kirkvaag.
biography.name: Rolf Kirkvaag Jr.

biography.bio: Gisle Straume was born on August 28, 1917 in Holla, Norway. He was an actor, known for Stompa & Co (1962), En hanske (1970) and Privattimen (1970). He died on December 1, 1988.
biography.name: Gisle Straume

biography.bio: Arne Lie was born on September 25, 1921 in Norway. He was an actor, known for Under a Stone Sky (1974), Før frostnettene (1966) and Den evige ektemann (1961). He died on January 22, 1982 in Norway.
biography.name: Arne Lie

biography.bio: Ragnhild Michelsen was born on June 23, 1911 in Narvik, Norway. She was an actress, known for Jeg lar deg ikke glemme (1971), De gamle damene (1969) and En fallitt (1979). She was married to Henrik Anker Steen. She died on September 30, 2000 in Oslo, Norway.
biography.name: Ragnhild Michelsen

biography.bio: Carsten Winger was born on May 18, 1907 in Norway. He was an actor, known for Skadeskutt (1951), Kasserer Jensen (1954) and Knutsen & Ludvigsen (1974). He died on August 19, 1992 in Norway.
biography.name: Carsten Winger

biography.bio: Celebrated Norwegian comedian with a special talent for dialects. On stage from 1938, when he became an actor at the Komedia Theater in his hometown Bergen. Later he was engaged at Chat Noir in Oslo,and made many touring around Norway with different company's, including Book-Jenssen, and later with The Norwegian Travelling Theater. In film and television he had many small, but effective parts in comedies, often seen as a guard, clerk or watchman. For Norwegian children he became an idol as the character "Bodø" in the Radio plays about "Stompa" (based on Anthony Buckeridge's "Jennings at School").
biography.name: Dan Fosse

biography.bio: Knut Eide is known for his work on Stompa, selvfølgelig! (1963), Stompa forelsker seg (1965) and Stompa & Co (1962).
biography.name: Knut Eide

biography.bio: Erna Schøyen was born on March 1, 1887 in Kabelvåg, Norway. She was an actress, known for Vi vil oss et land... (1936), Vi gifter oss (1951) and Tørres Snørtevold (1940). She died on December 21, 1968 in Norway.
biography.name: Erna Schøyen

biography.bio: Thor-Erik Thorbjørnsen is an actor, known for Stompa forelsker seg (1965), Stompa, selvfølgelig! (1963) and Stompa & Co (1962).
biography.name: Thor-Erik Thorbjørnsen

biography.bio: Didrik Arnesen was born on September 6, 1948 in Tønsberg, Norway. He was an actor, known for Stompa til Sjøs! (1967), Stompa, selvfølgelig! (1963) and Stompa & Co (1962). He died on September 8, 1989 in Hirtshals, Denmark.
biography.name: Didrik Arnesen

biography.bio: Thorkild Stray was born in 1948 in Kristiansand, Norway. He was an actor, known for Stompa, selvfølgelig! (1963), Stompa & Co (1962) and Stompa forelsker seg (1965). He died on September 18, 1970 in Kristiansand.
biography.name: Thorkild Stray

biography.bio: Ingmar Wareng is an actor, known for Stompa, selvfølgelig! (1963) and Stompa & Co (1962).
biography.name: Ingmar Wareng

biography.bio: John Olav Togstad is an actor, known for Stompa, selvfølgelig! (1963), Stompa forelsker seg (1965) and Stompa & Co (1962).
biography.name: John Olav Togstad

biography.bio: Willie Hoel was born on June 16, 1920 in Oslo, Norway. He was an actor, known for Fools in the Mountains (1957), Millionær for en aften (1960) and Ugler i mosen (1959). He died on June 15, 1986.
biography.name: Willie Hoel

biography.bio: Funny-faced Norwegian comic actor, mostly in supporting roles. His shy smile and a very personal attitude, made the audience burst into laughter. He was very popular in many skits and songs during the forties and fifties, often seen as a character from the streets of the city. (Oslo) His mute play together with another popular performer, Kari Diesen , was outstanding comedy, and is still shown repeatedly on Television. His personal life was unfortunately not so good, and his problems made a talented career untimely short.
biography.name: Arvid Nilssen
